snippet: Malaysia's state investment company said Friday it plans to make Malaysia Airlines fully government owned, removing it from the country's stock exchange before carrying out an overhaul of the carrier that is reeling from double disasters....

headline.print_headline: Malaysia Plans Overhaul of National Airline
headline.main: Malaysia Plans Overhaul of National Airline

lead_paragraph: Malaysia's state investment company said Friday it plans to make Malaysia Airlines fully government owned, removing it from the country's stock exchange before carrying out an overhaul of the carrier that is reeling from double disasters.
